cn.description: SkySafari 让观星成为一种简单的乐趣。它拥有所有天文学应用程序中最大的数据库，包括有史以来发现的每颗彗星、小行星、卫星和太阳系天体，提供无与伦比的精度、先进的规划和记录工具、完美的望远镜控制，并在您依赖它时提供星空下的最佳体验。不要推迟快乐。了解为什么 SkySafari 自 2009 年以来一直是专业业余天文学家推荐排名第一的天文学应用程序。

cn.description:
LUCH Films is a modern app for giving images the effect of film photography. Try unique bokeh effects, light leaks, noise and dust effects, and original filters.

20+ HANDMADE FILTERS

The application has over 20 different filters made by hand by a professional photographer. They are universal and made for various kinds of photos and colors, imitating the effects film KODAK and ILFORD.

FILM FRAMES FOR INSTAGRAM STORY AND FEED

We have adapted film frames for modern screen formats and added them to the application so that the warmth of film photography will always remain in our hearts and minds.

DUST EFFECT

Making a shabby photo is easy. You don't have to wait 20 years, you just have to choose one of 35 effects.

LIGHT LEAKS

You know these old light leaks shots that we loved to look at as children. We simulated the same light flashes in the LUCH FILMS.

BOKEH EFFECT

If you love bokeh as much as we do, then you should definitely love it. Choose from 35 bokeh and prism effects.

NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS, NO IN-APP PURCHASES

Take full control over your image, apply unique filters developed in collaboration with photographers. Create unique photos including new layers. Over 90 effects. The ability to apply noise and dust effects, light leaks, bokeh and prism effects to the image.

You can choose the size of the image for a stream or story, which is ideal for Instagram or other social networks. Film frames are also included in the LUCH Films.

Follow @luchfilmsapp on Instagram for inspiration from our community of users.
We love hearing your ideas and feedback. Please email hello@vostokapp.ru or DM us on Instagram at @luchfilmsapp for questions or suggestions.

advisories: 偶尔/轻微的卡通或幻想暴力
cn.description:
===铁皮公司正版授权===
===中国地区正式回归===

这是游戏创作者继获奖作品Kingdom Rush（王国保卫战）三部曲之后的又一超凡太空奇幻历险之作。即时，动态以及深度策略的游戏模式将带你穿越到不可思议的未知星球。沉浸式拟真游戏场景，过瘾的游戏玩法，以及超凡绝佳的艺术感和一丝诙谐幽默感带你进入激烈的战争世界。勇猛的士兵，威猛的机甲人和强大的外星人通通等你来统率，并肩迎接最强挑战。

招募和训练银河系中最伟大的英雄，率领他们参与几乎不可能完成的危险任务，发动他们强大的力量和能力。即使是在战斗最激烈的时候你也可通过改变自己部队的角色而进行战略调整，突击队员调整为狙击兵，火焰喷射器调整为导弹发射器。通过炸弹袭击，智能地雷，支援部队，砲塔和各种特种武器转变战斗态势。

机器人军队整装待发;星际战舰坠毁了;到处是巨大怪物，未知的种族;所向披靡的攻击;绝望的营救;无所畏惧地破坏行动正在银河之中发生......银河系需要你的统领。

银河系需要钢铁战队

***游戏特色***

-指导你的部队参加3个不同世界的21次任务。准备好发动英勇的攻击，坚守阵地，拯救平民，潜入超级计算机和各种英雄的物品。每个任务需要新的战术和行动才能取得胜利。

-通过17次终结式特别行动的战术规则测试你的机智。每个关卡通过伤痕铭记挑战。谅你也不敢。

-解锁不可能模式。仅对大无畏敢死队开放。谅你绝对不敢。

-在史诗战斗中击败巨大而非凡的头目。这些头目卑鄙而异常地巨大，他们决心要将你碾碎。钢铁战队，整装待发！

-40+升级以提升你的战略，同时授予你的部队防御无人机，凝固汽油弹火箭，反弹爆炸和更多的器械可使用。

-14位具有出色能力的英雄听从你的调遣。将他们训练到极致出色，否则惹恼他们后果自负。

-8种可向敌人发动进攻的特种武器，让你的战术更加具有深度。还有什么比得上一个瞄准了的导弹？对50枚高爆炸炸弹的轨道炮袭击！

-完成70+成就中的任何成就，赢得你应得的奖励。

选择你的游戏困难模式，找到属于你的公平挑战：休闲，普通或老兵，你自己决定！！

1.  新增 Emby / Jellyfin 媒体服务器支持.
2.  大幅提升蓝光原盘读取性能.
3.  重构了多语言支持.
4.  修复 EPUB 阅读器在新版本系统下的兼容性问题.
5.  修复某些云盘音频播放问题.
cn.description:
- zFuse 可播放所有视频格式和编码, 您无需将视频文件转换为MP4, 即可在移动设备中进行播放.

- zFuse 支持ASS/SSA/SUP特效字幕, 您可以体验到与Mac/PC版完全相同的特效字幕效果.

- zFuse 具有强大的网络技术, 您无需将视频文件存储在空间有限的设备中, 可以直接播放电脑或NAS上的各种格式视频, 无需转换, 无需下载, 即点即播.

- zFuse 支持直接登录多种云盘, 直接原画播放内容, 还可以阅读云盘中的小说/图片/源代码/直播源等, 甚至可以通过iOS版同步到zFuse TV版, 让您在tvOS中播放云盘内容.

- zFuse 也可以让您轻松地从电脑/NAS中直接下载文件/文件夹, 是您旅途中的最佳伴侣.

- zFuse 支持各种手势操作, 只需动动手指, 即可调整播放位置, 字体大小, 控制音量和亮度.

- zFuse 为您的隐私安全考虑, 拥有文件夹加密功能, 让您不再担心隐私问题.

- zFuse 还为广大学子准备了音视频变速不变调功能, 帮助您快速浏览课件.

- zFuse 还包含了一款强大的代码/文本编辑器, 支持各种程序语言/语法高亮/数十种编辑器风格等, 您可以用它直接在iPhone/iPad上编辑代码.

- zFuse 甚至可以作为一款文件管理工具, 您可以用它压缩/解压缩/浏览图片/阅读TXT, PDF, EPUB等各种电子书.

- zFuse的详细特性如下:

    * SMB/CIFS播放/自动发现(轻松播放PC上的共享媒体文件).
    * 直接通过SMB/CIFS/DLNA/FTP/WebDAV下载媒体文件/文件夹到iOS设备上.
    * UPnP/DLNA播放/自动发现.
    * Emby和Jellyfin媒体服务器支持.
    * 客户端之间可以通过二维码分享媒体文件/文件夹.
    * 直接使用PC资源管理器管理媒体文件夹.
    * AirPlay投屏播放.
    * 支持画中画模式.
    * 支持iPad分屏多任务.
    * 硬件加速.
    * 支持HDR Tone Mapping以便在非HDR显示设备中显示HDR内容.
    * 支持特效字幕.
    * 0.5x-3.0x播放速度控制.
    * 0.5x-5.0x屏幕缩放.
    * 支持Seeking时预览媒体内容.
    * 内建音频增强.
    * 多音轨选择.
    * 内嵌/外挂字幕选择.
    * 字幕同步.
    * 音频同步.
    * 支持外部字幕字体选择.
    * 播放列表文件预览功能.
    * 播放蓝光文件夹功能.
    * 直接在设备上管理和修改播放列表.
    * 直接播放外接U盘上的媒体文件.
    * 直播源有效性检测.
    * 屏幕镜像.

    * 文件管理:
        - 删除, 移动, 重命名, 创建文件夹.
        - 支持Wi-Fi传输, 无需连接USB线即可传输文件.
        - 支持创建流媒体播放列表.
        - 支持EPUB/TXT阅读器.
        - 支持解压缩常见压缩格式: 7z, zip, rar, tar, bz, bz2等.
        - 支持压缩常见格式: 7z, zip等.

    * 手势功能:
        - 水平拖动: 调整播放位置.
        - 在屏幕左侧竖直拖动: 调整音量.
        - 在屏幕右侧竖直拖动: 调整亮度.
        - 在屏幕上捏合: 屏幕尺寸调整.
        - 双击: 播放/暂停.
        - 两指双击: 切换屏幕高宽比.

    * 支持外接键盘:
        - 空格: 暂停/播放.
        - 左箭头: 快退.
        - 右箭头: 快进.
        - 上箭头: 增加音量.
        - 下箭头: 降低音量.
        - Esc: 退出播放.
        - S: 改变播放速度.
        - B: 上一首.
        - N: 下一首.
        - Z: 改变屏幕缩放.

    * 支持视频格式: MP4, MOV, MKV, AVI, WMV, FLV, RMVB, ASF, OGV, 蓝光ISO等所有常见格式.
    * 支持音频格式: MP3, WAV, WMA, FLAC, APE等.
    * 支持字幕格式: SRT, SSA, ASS, SUP, VTT等.
    * 支持图像格式: JPG, PNG, BMP, TIFF, GIF, HEIC等.
    * 支持电子书格式: EPUB, TXT, PDF.
    * 编辑器支持的语言格式: JSON, HTML, XML, C/C++, Lua, Java, Objective-C, Swift, Python, JavaScript.
    * 支持浏览的文档格式: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Numbers, Keynote, Pages, RTF, CSV.

cn.trackName: 随手记Pro–个人家庭生意记账
cn.releaseNotes:
- 优化了部分使用体验；

最近更新：
-【记一笔优化】记一笔时间选择弹窗支持快速切换年月，提升补账效率；
-【语音记账】神象云账本支持AI语音记账！你说话，AI记，记账和聊天一样轻松，还支持一句话同时记多笔。快长按 账本首页/记一笔 体验吧。
-【随手记会员】会员创建神象云账本额度全面提升，基础会员可持有账本数增至20个，专业会员更可享50个起。随手记基础会员、专业会员、免广告会员、空间会员所有账本通享，历史低价！可前往 我的页面/随手记会员中心 了解更多。
cn.description:
多赚会花每一天，记账就要随手记！个人、家庭、生意账随心选。
记账快捷又专业，轻松管理多人记账。多维度账单解读，全面了解你的财务状况。账单数据实时存，云端数据不丢失。

【神象云账本】
- 记一笔记账快捷又专业
- 账本首页流水页，数据呈现更清晰
- 云端存储数据，安全不丢失
- 账本操作必留痕，安全又省心

【海量账本模板，陪伴你的各个人生阶段】
to成长中的你：
- 高中生、大学生账本：生活费聪明花，课外兼职也能记
- 班费账本：班委管钱大家看，班费收支更透明
to工作中的你：
- 差旅报销流水账：流水详尽不漏报
- 网约司机、健身教练、装修队长：职业账本专属定制
to爱生活的你：
- 合租、恋爱、生活账：日常生活随心记
- 旅游、宠物、爱好账：为自己所爱的事物，记录美好回忆
- 攒钱、健身、目标账：设定一个小目标，让账本陪你变成想要的样子
to创业中的你：
- 奶茶、快餐、餐饮业：店铺经营实用工具
- 服装、代购、零售业：成本营收全把控，应收应付不遗漏
- 培训、酒店、服务业：各行各业全覆盖，首页报表指导经营
to顾家的你：
- 人情账本、结婚账本：人情红包收入支出一览无余
- 儿童教育、宝宝账本：家人共享宝贝成长点滴
- 汽车、储蓄家庭账本：日常生活分类全，全家合记一本账
还有更多账本模板等你发现！

【专业记账，省心易用】
- 记一笔：多人协同共同记账，随时随地记一笔
- 账本首页：首页即报表，数据卡片及图表让财务状况一目了然
- 流水：从各个维度查看收支情况，拒绝糊涂账
- 账户：全面了解你的各账户余额，手有余粮心不慌

————献给热爱记账的你————
生活需要一点仪式感。 有人每天早上一定要喝一杯咖啡， 有人每天睡前一定要写两句日记， 也有人每天都把挣到的和花过的每一分钱记录下来 在快节奏的时代，扫一扫就完成付款，动动手指就能解决三餐、完成购物。 移动支付把生活中的花销从实实在在的钱变成了一串变动的数字，很多时候我们对于花钱没有了概念，甚至，想不起来把钱花在了哪里。 这时，需要消费后的用心记账，提高自己对钱的敏感度。 希望热爱记账的你梳理财务状况的时候可以沉浸在随手记这个“工作台”！

【联系我们】 使用过程中如遇问题，欢迎联系我们，可爱的客服妹纸会认真处理你的每一个反馈哦。

Best app for tracking food, exercise! Consistently losing weight! I love how it shows you if you're on target for your goal. Great layout, great look, easy to use!!! I highly recommend this app if you're looking to be a healthier you!!!

Fast, intuitive, user friendly

hk.description:
生命是寶貴的，你的時間也是如此。 ATracker幫助你記錄你的時間。

ATracker是一款時間記錄APP，非常易于使用，只需要很少的設定。它支援：一鍵啟動/停止時間記錄;條形圖或餅圖顯示您的時間去向;完全可定制的用戶界面;用標簽對任務進行分類;CSV和PDF資料匯出;在多個設備之間同步資料;通過Apple Watch，Widget和Siri開始/停止記錄。
這是一個全新的方式來組織你的一天。

范圍
ATracker是一種干凈簡約的追蹤方式：
 - 工作中的不同任務和專案
 - 學校研究和專案
 - 健身
 - 社交
 - 家庭作業
 - 嬰兒或兒童日常活動
 - 業余愛好專案
 - 或任何人們想要記錄和時間管理的活動

功能特色:
 - 只需輕按一下即可開始和停止記錄任務。
 - 今日的時間使用概覽。
 - 目標系統。
 - 完整的活動日志。專案歷史記錄。添加錯過或修改現有的時間記錄。
 - 自定義活動，有數百個圖標可供選擇。您還可以對任務設定顏色。
 - 柱狀圖和餅型圖報告。
 - 按標簽分組任務，并允許用戶按今日標簽上的標記過濾任務，以及在報告中顯示持續時間或次數。
 - 任務記時即使在設備關閉時仍然工作。
 - 任務定時. 鬧鈴即使在套用關閉狀態仍然會響
 - 手勢支援
 - 小部件
 -  Apple Watch支援
 -  Siri快捷方式
 - iPad支援Split View和Slide Over的多任務支援。
 - 使用PDF和CSV檔案匯出資料。
 - 能夠為每個任務條目記錄文本注釋。
 - 完全自定義具有更多外觀的UI，并允許用戶使用自己的圖片作為背景。

WEB訂閱
通過Web訂閱，ATracker支援跨多個設備進行同步。除App外，它還提供對ATracker服務的Web訪問。此附加組件是可選的。
在套用內購買的 ATracker 服務會依照您的套餐每月或每年續訂。套餐價格可能會因國家/地區而異。

hk.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

You must stay alive in this horror/puzzle adventure. Try to survive the vengeful toys waiting for you in the abandoned toy factory. Use your GrabPack to hack electrical circuits or nab anything from afar. Explore the mysterious facility... and don't get caught.


---Welcome to Playtime Co.!---
Playtime Co. was once the king of the toy manufacturing industry... until everybody inside of the factory one day disappeared into thin air. Now, years later, you must explore the abandoned factory and uncover the truth.

---The Toys---
The toys of Playtime Co. are a lively bunch! From Bot to Huggy, Catbee to Poppy, Playtime does it all! As long as you're at Playtime Co., why not pay the toys a little visit? You might just make a few friends...

---The GrabPack---
This amazing GrabPack is a wearable backpack, accompanied by 2 artificial hands attached via steel wire. With this handy, state-of-the-art tool, there's no limit to what Playtime Co. employees can accomplish! The following list of features should help to show you what the GrabPack has to offer.

- The hands' powerful grip allows for movement of heavy objects with ease!
- A lengthy and flexible wire gives any employee the ability to reach whatever they may need, no matter the distance!
- The steel wire makes conducting electricity a breeze!

The only limit is the length of your GrabPack's wire.



Won't you stick around? There's lots of fun in store for you. It's almost Playtime...

20多個手提濾網

內幕故事和進給的膠片框架

除塵效果

製作破舊的照片很容易。您不必等待20年，只需選擇35種效果之一。

漏光

您知道我們喜歡小時候看過的這些舊的漏光鏡頭。我們在LUCH FILMS中模擬了相同的閃光。

效果

如果您像我們一樣熱愛散景，那麼您絕對應該喜歡它。從35種散景和棱鏡效果中進行選擇。

沒有廣告，沒有訂閱，沒有應用內購買

完全控制您的圖像，應用與攝影師合作開發的獨特濾鏡。創建獨特的照片，包括新圖層。超過90種效果。可以對圖像應用噪點和灰塵效果，漏光，散景和棱鏡效果。

我們喜歡聽到您的想法和反饋。請給我發電子郵件hello@vostokapp.ru或在Instagram上通過DM @@ luchfilmsapp向我們發送問題或建議。

hk.description:
體育實況。音樂。新聞。播客。

TuneIn 是一個應用程式，它彙集了來自世界各地的實況體育、音樂、新聞、播客和電臺。

只需動動手指即可存取世界上最大的即時、點播和原創音訊庫，聆聽對您來說最重要的訊息，發現讓您感動的新時刻。

透過體育實況、獨家音樂頻道、快速發佈的新聞、全球超過 570 萬個播客和超過 100,000 個廣播電臺，您隨時都能聽到令您驚喜的內容。

TuneIn Premium 使用者可以收聽 Fox News Radio 的無廣告新聞以及各種不間斷的無廣告音樂電臺。

下載 TuneIn 的五大理由：

1.不錯過一場體育賽事實況
您可以在工作場所、家中、健身房和路上聆聽。即時收聽體育講座 - 基本上在任何您可以收聽和點播的地方。

2.聽不完的音樂
永遠不用擔心只能選擇由著名 DJ、有影響力的時尚先鋒和特邀嘉賓策劃的獨家音樂電臺播放的下一首歌曲。發現每個流派的最佳新歌和藝術家，以及您最喜歡的所有歌曲和藝術家。

3.全方位的爆炸性新聞
收聽地方、全國和全球來源 24 小時即時新聞播報，透過 TuneIn Premium 收聽完全沒有廣告的 Fox News。

4.您最喜愛的所有播客
從榜首的節目到新發現的優秀節目，讓自己沉浸在談話的世界中。 關注像經典節目，探索最受歡迎的熱門歌曲，如 The Rachel Maddow 的 Bag Man、The Joe Rogan Experience 和 The Economist。

3.全方位的爆炸性新聞
收聽地方、全國和全球來源 24 小時即時新聞播報，透過 TuneIn Premium 收聽完全沒有廣告的 Fox News。

4.您最喜愛的所有播客
從榜首的節目到新發現的優秀節目，讓自己沉浸在談話的世界中。 關注像經典節目，探索最受歡迎的熱門歌曲，如 The Rachel Maddow 的 Bag Man、The Joe Rogan Experience 和 The Economist。

hk.description:
Thumper是一款節奏暴力遊戲：經典動作、猛烈的速度和野蠻的肉體衝撞。你是一隻太空甲蟲，勇敢闖入虛無空間，對抗巨大的首腦。

藉由特別的便攜版，讓你一手掌握九個史詩級別。

向前邁進，掌握新動作，並在可怕的魔王戰中倖存下來。被衝擊原聲推動，你會感受到每一個破碎的影響。要達到共鳴，你必須征服節奏地獄。

■特點■
·氣密一觸式控制
·肖像和風景皆為流暢的60 FPS
·九個史詩級別
·刺激的魔王戰
·迷幻視覺效果和原創配樂
·PLAY+模式（增加挑戰難度和速度）
·在iPhone X上以全螢幕顯示
·iCloud 同步

■請注意■
無線耳機會造成顯著的音頻延遲。為了獲得最佳體驗，強烈建議使用有線耳機或音響。

hk.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

hk.description:
你獨自一人在一座陌生的島嶼醒來，島上充滿各種令人意想不到的謎題，等你來挑戰。

你不記得自己是誰，也不記得是如何來到這裡，你唯一能做的就是探索這座島嶼，希望挖掘線索找回自己的記憶，想辦法找到回家的路。

The Witness 是一個單人遊戲，玩家在一個含有數十個地點的開放世界裡探索並克服 500 道以上的謎題。這個遊戲相當敬重玩家的聰明才智，並珍惜他們寶貴的時間。這裡沒有濫竽充數的謎題，每道謎題都結合新的概念在裡面。所以，這是一個充滿創意的遊戲。

Keep the words, pictures, videos, voice and positions you want to record at any time and anywhere.
And there are reminders that you can never forget.

mo.description:
【App功能简介】

• 空气枪 BiuGun 是一款体感动作模拟真实开火体验的互动工具；
• 界面极简设计，支持通过点击屏幕、手势动作触发开火、震动和与闪光效果，营造沉浸式射击体验；
• 支持多种设备，iPhone、Apple Watch和iPad，适合娱乐放松、穿戴演示及场景配音等用途。

---

【核心功能亮点】

• 多方式开火操作：支持点击、手机横置、手表抬腕等多种方式触发；
• 震动与闪光模拟：开火时同步震动与闪光灯，增强真实感；
• 多种武器音效：内置多种现代枪械与手雷音效，音质清晰；
• 极简黑色界面：风格克制，适合夜间或暗色环境使用；
• Apple Watch 支持：手表可独立触发，便于快速互动体验。

---

【推荐使用场景】

• 聚会互动：朋友间互动、搞怪整活增添气氛；
• 视频音效配音：适用于短视频制作、动作场景模拟等；
• 演示与教学：手表互动演示，适合穿戴设备展示；
• 压力释放与解闷：无聊时“点一点”“抖一抖”，模拟开火释放压力；
• 个性化表演道具：结合动作与音效，提升表演互动感。

mo.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

https://www.livesky.com/privacy.html

---The Train Station---
Explore one of Playtime Co.'s most popular locations, the Game Station! This Train Station is more than just a pitstop... there's games, a playground, and much, much more. Even better- the train provides a straight shot right out of the factory.

---New Toys---
This factory is filled with remnants of a crooked past- All you need to do is go deeper. Let's ask Bunzo Bunny. Or perhaps PJ Pug-a-pillar has some ideas. Or maybe... Mommy knows?

---The Green Hand---
The all-new Green Hand has been introduced into the GrabPack family! You can now carry power with you, remotely! That's not all... you can grapple now too! Innovation has done it again.



• Transfer power without the confines of a wire!
• Grab onto pipes and swing across missing flooring.
• Fly! Kind of- you can grapple straight up, more accurately.

Playtime's not over yet- stick around...

mo.description:
You must stay alive in this horror/puzzle adventure. Try to survive the vengeful toys waiting for you in the abandoned toy factory. Use your GrabPack to hack electrical circuits or nab anything from afar. Explore the mysterious facility... and don't get caught.


---Welcome to Playtime Co.!---
Playtime Co. was once the king of the toy manufacturing industry... until everybody inside of the factory one day disappeared into thin air. Now, years later, you must explore the abandoned factory and uncover the truth.

---The Toys---
The toys of Playtime Co. are a lively bunch! From Bot to Huggy, Catbee to Poppy, Playtime does it all! As long as you're at Playtime Co., why not pay the toys a little visit? You might just make a few friends...

---The GrabPack---
This amazing GrabPack is a wearable backpack, accompanied by 2 artificial hands attached via steel wire. With this handy, state-of-the-art tool, there's no limit to what Playtime Co. employees can accomplish! The following list of features should help to show you what the GrabPack has to offer.

- The hands' powerful grip allows for movement of heavy objects with ease!
- A lengthy and flexible wire gives any employee the ability to reach whatever they may need, no matter the distance!
- The steel wire makes conducting electricity a breeze!

The only limit is the length of your GrabPack's wire.



Won't you stick around? There's lots of fun in store for you. It's almost Playtime...

mo.description:
LUCH Films是一款現代應用程序，用於為圖像賦予膠片攝影效果。嘗試獨特的散景效果，漏光，噪音和灰塵效果以及原始濾鏡。

20多個手提濾網

該應用程序有20多種由專業攝影師手工製作的濾鏡。它們是通用的，可模仿各種膠片和柯達和ILFORD製成，用於各種照片和色彩。

內幕故事和進給的膠片框架

我們已經將膠卷框架調整為適合現代屏幕格式，並將其添加到應用程序中，以使膠卷攝影的熱情永遠存在於我們的心靈中。

除塵效果

製作破舊的照片很容易。您不必等待20年，只需選擇35種效果之一。

漏光

您知道我們喜歡小時候看過的這些舊的漏光鏡頭。我們在LUCH FILMS中模擬了相同的閃光。

效果

如果您像我們一樣熱愛散景，那麼您絕對應該喜歡它。從35種散景和棱鏡效果中進行選擇。

沒有廣告，沒有訂閱，沒有應用內購買

完全控制您的圖像，應用與攝影師合作開發的獨特濾鏡。創建獨特的照片，包括新圖層。超過90種效果。可以對圖像應用噪點和灰塵效果，漏光，散景和棱鏡效果。

您可以為信息流或故事選擇圖像的大小，這是Instagram或其他社交網絡的理想選擇。膠卷相框也包括在LUCH膠卷中。

在Instagram上關注@luchfilmsapp，以從我們的用戶社區中汲取靈感。
我們喜歡聽到您的想法和反饋。請給我發電子郵件hello@vostokapp.ru或在Instagram上通過DM @@ luchfilmsapp向我們發送問題或建議。

Filca 是一款單反膠卷相機。
35種膠卷濾鏡和電影效果讓您的照片栩栩如生。

@veteranUser
"沒有Filca，你只是在收集時刻，
有了Filca，你在保存記憶。"

使用Filca的專家級手動控制精通您的拍攝。

■ 手動模式下的快門速度、ISO、白平衡控制
■ 來自業界領導者如Kodak、Fuji、Agfa的35mm膠卷濾鏡

Filca旨在優化您的快照體驗。
非常適合拍攝人物、自拍、夜景以及捕捉日常生活的微妙美麗。
應用我們的濾鏡，以實現真正的模擬膠片外觀。

主要特性：

帶35mm膠卷濾鏡的自動模式相機
手動模式（曝光和對焦）
對快門速度、ISO的完全控制
各種寬高比：4:3、3:2、16:9、1:1
數字變焦可放大至8倍
手動對焦控制（微距、風景）
來自Fuji、Kodak、Agfa的35mm膠卷濾鏡（包括黑白濾鏡）
膠片顆粒效果
膠片日期打印效果
光學圖像穩定
低功耗模式
自拍模式
EXIF數據存儲（包括位置數據）
人像增強
全分辨率照片
定時器和閃光燈功能
網格模式視圖
專業特性：

白平衡調整功能
日期打印功能
在Instagram上使用#filca分享您的照片，我們期待展示您的作品。
關注我們的Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/filca.app/

使用條款：https://han.gl/HCCwV
隱私政策：https://han.gl/Wclkw

讓我們與Filca一起提升您的攝影旅程。

mo.description:
During the evening rush on a crowded train, the player takes on the role of an ordinary office worker who encounters a mysterious girl. A sudden blackout traps the train in a strange time loop.
Work together with the girl to freely explore train cars and platforms, uncover clues, talk, solve hidden puzzles, and escape the rail-bound mystery.

Core Features:
Event Exploration: Tap-to-interact system in train cars to uncover items and puzzles.
Relationship Building: Dialogue choices with the girl influence the story.
Multiple Endings: Every decision affects whether you escape or uncover the truth.

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
mo.trackName: 王國保衛戰：起源 Kingdom Rush Origins
mo.description:
"***2015年DICE最佳行動遊戲提名***

最讓人愛不釋手的塔防遊戲，全新冒險前傳重磅回歸——歡迎來到《王國保衛戰：起源》！

《王國保衛戰》系列廣受好評：iPhone, iPod touch與iPad上排名第一的戰略遊戲系列，獲得Apple編輯推薦獎、IGN編輯推薦獎、Slide To Play必玩遊戲、GameInformer金獎、148Apps編輯推薦、Jay is Games年度遊戲獎、Pocket Gamer金獎、CNET最佳iPad遊戲、CNET編輯推薦獎、Gamezebo評分4.5/5、Touch Arcade評分4.5/5、Venturebeat評分94/100。

看看大家怎麼評價《王國保衛戰：起源》：

「《王國保衛戰》系列是最讚的塔防系列遊戲之一，第三部的“起源”還是那麼好玩。」——美國《娛樂周刊》 

「這些年我玩了很多塔防遊戲，但是沒有一款遊戲像《王國保衛戰》系列這樣抓住了我的心。」——The Verge 

「《王國保衛戰：起源》高清版保留了原汁原味的內容，簡直完美。」——148Apps 

「畫面精美，玩法超棒，音樂好聽，還有趣味彩蛋。喜歡塔防遊戲的玩家，一定要下載這一款遊戲。」——TUAW 

「這款讓人沉浸的塔防遊戲，能滿足你所有對新遊戲的期待：新的防禦塔、新的英雄，還有超讚的玩法。」——Kotaku 

「如果你愛好塔防遊戲，你應該熟悉《王國保衛戰》和它的續作《王國保衛戰：前線》。第三部作品現已發佈，沒錯，它就是迄今為止最讚的作品。」——Gamezebo 

《王國保衛戰：起源》是獲獎遊戲《王國保衛戰》冒險系列的第三部作品，受到數百萬玩家的喜愛，贏得全球遊戲玩家和評論的讚賞。在威之難企圖用力量寶石威脅王國之前，踏上回到起點的旅程，體驗更多快如閃電、引人入勝的玩法，一切都使這款作品成為塔防遊戲的重要基石。在這部激動人心的續作中，憑藉全新的防禦塔、英雄和法術，指揮你的精靈軍隊，守護神秘的土地，免受海蛇、邪惡巫師和一大波豺狼部落族人的侵擾，消滅全部壞蛋。

《王國保衛戰：起源》帶來有趣的新內容與功能，同時保留了眾多玩家喜愛的標誌性視覺元素。

遊戲特色 
· 重返《王國保衛戰》的世界：探訪神秘的精靈森林、神奇的仙境和古城的浮空遺跡！
· 用全新的防禦塔和部隊釋放精靈的力量！精靈弓箭手、秘法師、石環德魯伊和精靈步兵一起組成軍隊的中堅 
· 發現具有18種技能的8個新防禦塔特別升級！讓精靈射手、符文巨熊、魔法巫師和精靈巨樹為你消滅敵人。
· 拿起武器，對抗30種敵人，加入史詩級頭目戰鬥！正面抗擊成群的豺狼人、巨型蜘蛛和可怕的暮光軍隊。
· 掌控升級16個傳奇英雄和他們強大的力量與法術！
· 施出雷電，召喚援軍，用每個英雄獨特的力量去消滅大批敵人！
· 70個成就、新手與老玩家都可選擇3種難度模式，讓你沉浸在快樂的遊戲中。
· 體驗不同的遊戲模式——經典、鋼鐵和英雄模式——證明自己戰術大師的勇氣。
· 在升級的地精商店內，用轉去的寶石購買全新升級的裝備。
· 參考百科全書了解你的敵人和防禦塔"

mo.releaseNotes: Changed default lane control setting to touch controls.
mo.description:
Thumper是一款節奏暴力遊戲：經典動作、猛烈的速度和野蠻的肉體衝撞。你是一隻太空甲蟲，勇敢闖入虛無空間，對抗巨大的首腦。

藉由特別的便攜版，讓你一手掌握九個史詩級別。

向前邁進，掌握新動作，並在可怕的魔王戰中倖存下來。被衝擊原聲推動，你會感受到每一個破碎的影響。要達到共鳴，你必須征服節奏地獄。

■特點■
·氣密一觸式控制
·肖像和風景皆為流暢的60 FPS
·九個史詩級別
·刺激的魔王戰
·迷幻視覺效果和原創配樂
·PLAY+模式（增加挑戰難度和速度）
·在iPhone X上以全螢幕顯示
·iCloud 同步

■請注意■
無線耳機會造成顯著的音頻延遲。為了獲得最佳體驗，強烈建議使用有線耳機或音響。

mo.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

mo.releaseNotes: Fix for startup crash when Speak Screen accessibility option is enabled
mo.description:
你獨自一人在一座陌生的島嶼醒來，島上充滿各種令人意想不到的謎題，等你來挑戰。

你不記得自己是誰，也不記得是如何來到這裡，你唯一能做的就是探索這座島嶼，希望挖掘線索找回自己的記憶，想辦法找到回家的路。

The Witness 是一個單人遊戲，玩家在一個含有數十個地點的開放世界裡探索並克服 500 道以上的謎題。這個遊戲相當敬重玩家的聰明才智，並珍惜他們寶貴的時間。這裡沒有濫竽充數的謎題，每道謎題都結合新的概念在裡面。所以，這是一個充滿創意的遊戲。

tw.description:
【App功能简介】

• 空气枪 BiuGun 是一款体感动作模拟真实开火体验的互动工具；
• 界面极简设计，支持通过点击屏幕、手势动作触发开火、震动和与闪光效果，营造沉浸式射击体验；
• 支持多种设备，iPhone、Apple Watch和iPad，适合娱乐放松、穿戴演示及场景配音等用途。

---

【核心功能亮点】

• 多方式开火操作：支持点击、手机横置、手表抬腕等多种方式触发；
• 震动与闪光模拟：开火时同步震动与闪光灯，增强真实感；
• 多种武器音效：内置多种现代枪械与手雷音效，音质清晰；
• 极简黑色界面：风格克制，适合夜间或暗色环境使用；
• Apple Watch 支持：手表可独立触发，便于快速互动体验。

---

【推荐使用场景】

• 聚会互动：朋友间互动、搞怪整活增添气氛；
• 视频音效配音：适用于短视频制作、动作场景模拟等；
• 演示与教学：手表互动演示，适合穿戴设备展示；
• 压力释放与解闷：无聊时“点一点”“抖一抖”，模拟开火释放压力；
• 个性化表演道具：结合动作与音效，提升表演互动感。

tw.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

tw.description:
---The Train Station---
Explore one of Playtime Co.'s most popular locations, the Game Station! This Train Station is more than just a pitstop... there's games, a playground, and much, much more. Even better- the train provides a straight shot right out of the factory.

---New Toys---
This factory is filled with remnants of a crooked past- All you need to do is go deeper. Let's ask Bunzo Bunny. Or perhaps PJ Pug-a-pillar has some ideas. Or maybe... Mommy knows?

---The Green Hand---
The all-new Green Hand has been introduced into the GrabPack family! You can now carry power with you, remotely! That's not all... you can grapple now too! Innovation has done it again.



• Transfer power without the confines of a wire!
• Grab onto pipes and swing across missing flooring.
• Fly! Kind of- you can grapple straight up, more accurately.

Playtime's not over yet- stick around...

tw.description:
You must stay alive in this horror/puzzle adventure. Try to survive the vengeful toys waiting for you in the abandoned toy factory. Use your GrabPack to hack electrical circuits or nab anything from afar. Explore the mysterious facility... and don't get caught.


---Welcome to Playtime Co.!---
Playtime Co. was once the king of the toy manufacturing industry... until everybody inside of the factory one day disappeared into thin air. Now, years later, you must explore the abandoned factory and uncover the truth.

---The Toys---
The toys of Playtime Co. are a lively bunch! From Bot to Huggy, Catbee to Poppy, Playtime does it all! As long as you're at Playtime Co., why not pay the toys a little visit? You might just make a few friends...

---The GrabPack---
This amazing GrabPack is a wearable backpack, accompanied by 2 artificial hands attached via steel wire. With this handy, state-of-the-art tool, there's no limit to what Playtime Co. employees can accomplish! The following list of features should help to show you what the GrabPack has to offer.

- The hands' powerful grip allows for movement of heavy objects with ease!
- A lengthy and flexible wire gives any employee the ability to reach whatever they may need, no matter the distance!
- The steel wire makes conducting electricity a breeze!

The only limit is the length of your GrabPack's wire.



Won't you stick around? There's lots of fun in store for you. It's almost Playtime...

tw.description:
LUCH Films是一款現代應用程序，用於為圖像賦予膠片攝影效果。嘗試獨特的散景效果，漏光，噪音和灰塵效果以及原始濾鏡。

20多個手提濾網

該應用程序有20多種由專業攝影師手工製作的濾鏡。它們是通用的，可模仿各種膠片和柯達和ILFORD製成，用於各種照片和色彩。

內幕故事和進給的膠片框架

我們已經將膠卷框架調整為適合現代屏幕格式，並將其添加到應用程序中，以使膠卷攝影的熱情永遠存在於我們的心靈中。

除塵效果

製作破舊的照片很容易。您不必等待20年，只需選擇35種效果之一。

漏光

您知道我們喜歡小時候看過的這些舊的漏光鏡頭。我們在LUCH FILMS中模擬了相同的閃光。

效果

如果您像我們一樣熱愛散景，那麼您絕對應該喜歡它。從35種散景和棱鏡效果中進行選擇。

沒有廣告，沒有訂閱，沒有應用內購買

完全控制您的圖像，應用與攝影師合作開發的獨特濾鏡。創建獨特的照片，包括新圖層。超過90種效果。可以對圖像應用噪點和灰塵效果，漏光，散景和棱鏡效果。

您可以為信息流或故事選擇圖像的大小，這是Instagram或其他社交網絡的理想選擇。膠卷相框也包括在LUCH膠卷中。

在Instagram上關注@luchfilmsapp，以從我們的用戶社區中汲取靈感。
我們喜歡聽到您的想法和反饋。請給我發電子郵件hello@vostokapp.ru或在Instagram上通過DM @@ luchfilmsapp向我們發送問題或建議。

tw.description:
During the evening rush on a crowded train, the player takes on the role of an ordinary office worker who encounters a mysterious girl. A sudden blackout traps the train in a strange time loop.
Work together with the girl to freely explore train cars and platforms, uncover clues, talk, solve hidden puzzles, and escape the rail-bound mystery.

Core Features:
Event Exploration: Tap-to-interact system in train cars to uncover items and puzzles.
Relationship Building: Dialogue choices with the girl influence the story.
Multiple Endings: Every decision affects whether you escape or uncover the truth.

厭倦了一直重複輸入相同的響應？短語板通過易於訪問的短語對鍵盤進行自定義和分類。

添加一個類別和一些常用短語，您可以立即編輯，收聽和翻譯文本，然後在Facebook，Twitter，Instagram上共享它，或者僅通過電子郵件，LINE或SMS形式發送。

使用獨特的字體和顏色自定義您的短語和鍵盤！
超過100種創意字體可供選擇！
可以翻譯超過59種語言！

特徵：
•具有創意字體的全鍵盤。
•創建最常用的短語並按類別對其進行排序。
•在鍵盤上的任何應用程序中使用短語。
•更改短語的字體以匹配您選擇的外觀。*
•設計鍵盤樣式，包括按鈕和背景色。*
•將自定義照片設置為鍵盤背景。
•保存您的樣式，並在樣式管理器中從精選主題中進行選擇。
•選擇啟用的字體並管理其順序。
•更改鍵盤和按鈕的大小
•將您的短語翻譯成多種語言，然後直接在鍵盤中使用它們。*
•語音模式會大聲朗讀您的短語。*
•使用所有類型的表情符號來表達您的創造力。
•只需點擊一個按鈕即可發送快速回复。
•商業專業人員和社交媒體創作者的絕佳工具！

還：
•在任何應用程序中發送GIF和圖像。
•單擊即可共享您的位置。
•在各種字體之間切換而無需更改短語。*
•從大量字體中選擇。*
•自定義字體大小。*
•自定義字體顏色。*
•使用“安全”類別保護短語。
•使用短語面板小部件直接從通知中心添加短語。
•使用iCloud在所有設備中同步您的短語。
•直接在您喜歡的社交媒體應用（如Instagram，Facebook或Twitter）中使用。
•直接在iMessage，SMS或Apps中使用。
•創建自動回复文本，以幫助快速簡便地鍵入內容。
•使用短語快捷方式進行自信交流。

（*）需要有效的訂閱

記住：為了在鍵盤上顯示您的短語，您必須允許OPEN ACCESS。要允許它，請轉到設置>鍵盤，單擊短語面板，然後將開關打開。
（僅短語板需要開放訪問權限，才能在鍵盤上顯示您的自定義短語。我們從不保存或記錄您的任何擊鍵）。

短語板高級訂閱信息

加入Phraseboard Premium可以進行3天的免費試用，然後每月收取會員費。

•訂閱會自動續訂，除非在當前期間結束前至少24小時關閉了自動續訂功能。

•將在當前期間結束前的24小時內向帳戶收取續訂費用。

•訂閱可以由用戶管理，並且可以通過購買後轉到用戶的“帳戶設置”來關閉自動續訂。

•如果適用，則免費試用期中任何未使用的部分（如果提供）將在用戶購買訂閱時被沒收。

隱私政策：https://phraseboard.wixsite.com/phraseboard/untitled-c82w
服務條款：https://phraseboard.wixsite.com/phraseboard/terms

tw.description:
MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY

BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY
Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success.

ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM
Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination.

REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS
Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars.

UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK
Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry.

DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE
Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey.

YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE
Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you.

SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY
It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

tw.description:
Thumper是一款節奏暴力遊戲：經典動作、猛烈的速度和野蠻的肉體衝撞。你是一隻太空甲蟲，勇敢闖入虛無空間，對抗巨大的首腦。

藉由特別的便攜版，讓你一手掌握九個史詩級別。

向前邁進，掌握新動作，並在可怕的魔王戰中倖存下來。被衝擊原聲推動，你會感受到每一個破碎的影響。要達到共鳴，你必須征服節奏地獄。

■特點■
·氣密一觸式控制
·肖像和風景皆為流暢的60 FPS
·九個史詩級別
·刺激的魔王戰
·迷幻視覺效果和原創配樂
·PLAY+模式（增加挑戰難度和速度）
·在iPhone X上以全螢幕顯示
·iCloud 同步

■請注意■
無線耳機會造成顯著的音頻延遲。為了獲得最佳體驗，強烈建議使用有線耳機或音響。

tw.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

tw.description:
你獨自一人在一座陌生的島嶼醒來，島上充滿各種令人意想不到的謎題，等你來挑戰。

你不記得自己是誰，也不記得是如何來到這裡，你唯一能做的就是探索這座島嶼，希望挖掘線索找回自己的記憶，想辦法找到回家的路。

The Witness 是一個單人遊戲，玩家在一個含有數十個地點的開放世界裡探索並克服 500 道以上的謎題。這個遊戲相當敬重玩家的聰明才智，並珍惜他們寶貴的時間。這裡沒有濫竽充數的謎題，每道謎題都結合新的概念在裡面。所以，這是一個充滿創意的遊戲。

Keep the words, pictures, videos, voice and positions you want to record at any time and anywhere.
And there are reminders that you can never forget.

us.description:
【App功能简介】

• 空气枪 BiuGun 是一款体感动作模拟真实开火体验的互动工具；
• 界面极简设计，支持通过点击屏幕、手势动作触发开火、震动和与闪光效果，营造沉浸式射击体验；
• 支持多种设备，iPhone、Apple Watch和iPad，适合娱乐放松、穿戴演示及场景配音等用途。

---

【核心功能亮点】

• 多方式开火操作：支持点击、手机横置、手表抬腕等多种方式触发；
• 震动与闪光模拟：开火时同步震动与闪光灯，增强真实感；
• 多种武器音效：内置多种现代枪械与手雷音效，音质清晰；
• 极简黑色界面：风格克制，适合夜间或暗色环境使用；
• Apple Watch 支持：手表可独立触发，便于快速互动体验。

---

【推荐使用场景】

• 聚会互动：朋友间互动、搞怪整活增添气氛；
• 视频音效配音：适用于短视频制作、动作场景模拟等；
• 演示与教学：手表互动演示，适合穿戴设备展示；
• 压力释放与解闷：无聊时“点一点”“抖一抖”，模拟开火释放压力；
• 个性化表演道具：结合动作与音效，提升表演互动感。

us.description:
LUCH Films is a modern app for giving images the effect of film photography. Try unique bokeh effects, light leaks, noise and dust effects, and original filters.

20+ HANDMADE FILTERS

The application has over 20 different filters made by hand by a professional photographer. They are universal and made for various kinds of photos and colors, imitating the effects film KODAK and ILFORD.

FILM FRAMES FOR INSTAGRAM STORY AND FEED

We have adapted film frames for modern screen formats and added them to the application so that the warmth of film photography will always remain in our hearts and minds.

DUST EFFECT

Making a shabby photo is easy. You don't have to wait 20 years, you just have to choose one of 35 effects.

LIGHT LEAKS

You know these old light leaks shots that we loved to look at as children. We simulated the same light flashes in the LUCH FILMS.

BOKEH EFFECT

If you love bokeh as much as we do, then you should definitely love it. Choose from 35 bokeh and prism effects.

NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS, NO IN-APP PURCHASES

Take full control over your image, apply unique filters developed in collaboration with photographers. Create unique photos including new layers. Over 90 effects. The ability to apply noise and dust effects, light leaks, bokeh and prism effects to the image.

You can choose the size of the image for a stream or story, which is ideal for Instagram or other social networks. Film frames are also included in the LUCH Films.

Follow @luchfilmsapp on Instagram for inspiration from our community of users.
We love hearing your ideas and feedback. Please email hello@vostokapp.ru or DM us on Instagram at @luchfilmsapp for questions or suggestions.

us.description:
**Apple's No.1 paid iPhone app for 7 years running**

97% of learners pass their Theory Test using nothing more than this 4 in 1 AWARD-WINNING app*! Revise with full confidence knowing you have EVERYTHING you need to pass your 2025 Theory Test first time, getting you 1 step closer to your full DVLA licence, or we’ll give you your test fee back if you fail.

Join the 18 MILLION+ learner drivers we’ve helped prepare for their driving theory test.

Suitable for:
• Car Drivers in GB & NI
• Motorcyclists in GB & NI
• Trainee ADI's in GB & NI
• HGV/LGV & PCV Drivers preparing to take Module 1a and 1b Tests in GB & NI

DRIVING THEORY TEST 2025
Practise the latest Theory Test revision questions, answers and explanations, licensed directly from the DVSA (the people who set the official test). No other Theory Test app contains more revision questions!

Sit UNLIMITED timed mock tests including the NEW DVSA video case studies. Car drivers can practise multiple-choice questions based on a short video...just like the real test.

Keep a daily track of your progress so you know when you’re ready to sit the official Theory Test!

FREE PASS GUARANTEE
We’re so confident that our app will help you pass your Driving Theory Test, we will give you your £23 test fee back if you fail after completing the revision plan in full. Available for learner car drivers and motorcyclists only. T&C’s apply**.

LEARNER PLAN
Struggling to know where to start with your Theory Test revision? Our structured Learner Plan ensures you a first time pass, guiding you through your revision from start to finish.

LEADERBOARD
Rev up your revision with our NEW weekly Leaderboard! Earn points for acing practice quizzes, passing Mock Tests and more. Revise for a prize as you make the most of your study sessions.

SMART AI MODE
Want a more tailored approach to revision? Smart AI Mode makes revising for your theory test more efficient and tracks your progress to help you concentrate on the areas where you need the most support.

VOICEOVER
English voiceover available for all Driving Theory Test revision questions PLUS The Highway Code...ideal for users with reading difficulties or dyslexia.

HAZARD PERCEPTION TEST
85 interactive video clips, including all 34 DVSA CGI clips covering bad weather and night time driving, with built-in cheat detection just like in the official test.

THE HIGHWAY CODE 2025 Edition
Revise and refresh your knowledge of the latest UK Highway Code. Includes English voiceover.

ROAD SIGNS 2025
Learn ALL the UK road signs with over 1,500 photos and descriptions.

Optional LEARN TO DRIVE PRACTICAL CAR DRIVING CONTENT
Includes:
• 3 day trial access to over 250 virtual Practical Driving Lesson videos, to help you learn and understand the routines and manoeuvres that you could be asked to perform on your Driving Test
• The top 10 reasons for failing
• Learn how to banish test nerves and anxiety
• A full mock driving test with examiner debrief
• All the latest DVSA help and advice on the 'Ready to Pass?' campaign

us.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

us.description:
You wake up, alone, on a strange island full of puzzles that will challenge and surprise you.

You don't remember who you are, and you don't remember how you got here, but there's one thing you can do: explore the island in hope of discovering clues, regaining your memory, and somehow finding your way home.

The Witness is a single-player game in an open world with dozens of locations to explore and over 500 puzzles. This game respects you as an intelligent player and it treats your time as precious. There's no filler; each of those puzzles brings its own new idea into the mix. So, this is a game full of ideas.

us.description:
A game about positive impact on nature and eco-friendly living. 
Ecology strategy games where you reconnect with nature and create a green world for future civilizations. Take on the role of a planet protection fund and stabilize its environmental situation. Join the global movement to save the planet Earth!

About game ECO inc. Save The Earth:
* Take on the role of a planet protection fund and develop environmental initiatives.
* Various game mechanics: from resource management to diplomacy.
* Complex tasks and unexpected events that will test your strategic thinking.
* An opportunity to make a real contribution to saving the planet by raising awareness of environmental issues.
*Global Challenges: Climate change, environmental pollution, resource depletion - all these challenges require your solution. Don't let the environmental catastrophe spread like a "plague" across the planet Earth.
*Strategic Planning: Develop long-term plans, consider all factors, and make fateful 
decisions that will determine the future of the Earth.
*Economic Development: Manage resources, invest in new technologies and build a green future world.
*Volunteering: Send your heroes to help those in need, participate in international projects and fight for a clean planet.
* Education: Raise your eco-awareness, study real problems and find ways to solve them.

How to play the planet saving game tutorial guide:
The player's goal is to stabilize the environmental situation on the entire planet at an early stage.
Then, step by step, restore and improve the eco-situation of the Earth. Yeah, it's an epic quest ;)
At the end of the game, you will receive statistics on how successful your mission was.
Each step leads to different consequences, you will need to take thoughtful and quick actions.

Useful information:
Green Days: Eco Calendar — your personal guide to the planet’s most important environmental events!
Follow Earth Days, Forest Days, Ocean Days, and Biodiversity Days. Plan your eco-actions and help make the world greener!

List of Global Green Holidays:

February 2 — World Wetlands Day
March 3 — World Wildlife Day
March 21 — International Day of Forests
March 22 — World Water Day
March 23 — World Meteorological Day
April 7 — World Health Day (eco-focus)
April 22 — Earth Day
May 22 — International Day for Biological Diversity
June 5 — World Environment Day
June 8 — World Oceans Day
June 17 — World Day to Combat Desertification and Drought
July 28 — World Nature Conservation Day
September 16 — International Day for the Preservation of the Ozone Layer
October 4 — World Animal Day
October 13 — International Day for Disaster Risk Reduction
November 6 — International Day for Preventing the Exploitation of the Environment in War and Armed Conflict
December 11 — International Mountain Day

Join millions of eco heroes around the world and become part of the global movement to save the planet! :)

Keep the words, pictures, videos, voice and positions you want to record at any time and anywhere.
And there are reminders that you can never forget.

us.description:
RADIO, YOUR WAY

Listen to all the live news, sports, music, podcasts and radio you love, from around the world—all on the TuneIn app.

TuneIn Pro is a special version of the TuneIn app that, for a one-time fee, removes visual display ads and pre-roll commercials that normally play before content begins.


ALL YOUR AUDIO IN ONE APP.

• News: Stay informed with 24/7 news from local, national, and global sources, including CNN, MSNBC, FOX News Radio, NPR, and BBC.

• Sports: Listen to live NFL, NHL, and college games, anywhere you go, plus local, national, and global sports talk stations. And, get instant gametime notifications and customized listening when you pick your teams on the app.

• Music: Find tunes for any mood with exclusive music channels, including Today's Hits, Classic Rock Hits, and Country Roads.

• Podcasts: Follow your passions and stream your favorite podcasts.

• Radio: Stream your more than 100,000 AM, FM, and internet radio stations broadcasting from 197 countries.


UNLOCK EVEN MORE WITH TUNEIN PREMIUM

Sign up for the optional TuneIn Premium plan to hear:

• Live Sports: Never miss a moment with live home radio broadcasts of every NFL and NHL game, plus college football and basketball.

• News with Fewer Ad Breaks: Keep up with breaking news with fewer ad breaks from CNBC, CNN, FOX News Radio and MSNBC.

• Commercial-Free Music: Enjoy curated music stations, nonstop with no ads.

• Fewer Ads: Hear 100,000+ radio stations with fewer ads and commercial breaks.


WHAT YOU GET WITH THE TUNEIN APP

1. NEWS FROM ALL SIDES

Experience live 24/7 news from CNN, MSNBC, FOX News Radio plus local stations and podcasts.

2. UNRIVALED LIVE SPORTS & SPORTS TALK

Fuel your fandom with live play-by-play of NFL, NHL, and college football and basketball. Plus, hear news, analysis, and fan discussions from sports talk stations like ESPN Radio and talkSPORT. And, receive gametime notifications and customized content when you pick your favorite teams on the app. Plus, listen to podcasts covering your football, baseball, basketball, and hockey obsession from every angle.

3. MUSIC FOR EVERY MOOD

Listen to the perfect music for every moment with TuneIn's exclusive, curated stations. Or listen to local stations and programs from the best AM/FM channels in the world. You now also have access to your favorite iHeartRadio stations from across the country, including POWER 105 in New York, KISS FM in Los Angeles, 98.1 The Breeze in San Francisco, and more.

4. PODCASTS FOR ANY PASSION

From trending chart-toppers to niche favorites, follow shows like RadioLab, Stuff You Should Know, and TED Radio Hour, and top-rated hits like NPR's Up First, NYT's The Daily, Wow in the World, and more.

5. LISTEN WHEREVER YOU ARE

In addition to the mobile and desktop app, TuneIn is available for free on hundreds of connected devices, including Apple Watch, CarPlay, Google Home, Amazon Echo and Alexa, Sonos, Bose, Roku, Chromecast, and more.


Subscribe to TuneIn Radio Premium through the free app. If you choose to subscribe, you will be charged a monthly subscription fee according to your country. The subscription fee will be shown in the app before you complete the payment. Your subscription will automatically renew every month at the then-current subscription fee unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the then-current subscription period. Your iTunes account will automatically be charged within 24 hours prior to the end of the then-current period. The subscription fee will be charged monthly. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings.

Privacy policy: http://tunein.com/policies/privacy/
Terms of use: http://tunein.com/policies/

TuneIn uses Nielsen measurement software which allows you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. To learn more about Nielsen's products and your privacy, please visit http://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.

tr.description:
【App功能简介】

• 空气枪 BiuGun 是一款体感动作模拟真实开火体验的互动工具；
• 界面极简设计，支持通过点击屏幕、手势动作触发开火、震动和与闪光效果，营造沉浸式射击体验；
• 支持多种设备，iPhone、Apple Watch和iPad，适合娱乐放松、穿戴演示及场景配音等用途。

---

【核心功能亮点】

• 多方式开火操作：支持点击、手机横置、手表抬腕等多种方式触发；
• 震动与闪光模拟：开火时同步震动与闪光灯，增强真实感；
• 多种武器音效：内置多种现代枪械与手雷音效，音质清晰；
• 极简黑色界面：风格克制，适合夜间或暗色环境使用；
• Apple Watch 支持：手表可独立触发，便于快速互动体验。

---

【推荐使用场景】

• 聚会互动：朋友间互动、搞怪整活增添气氛；
• 视频音效配音：适用于短视频制作、动作场景模拟等；
• 演示与教学：手表互动演示，适合穿戴设备展示；
• 压力释放与解闷：无聊时“点一点”“抖一抖”，模拟开火释放压力；
• 个性化表演道具：结合动作与音效，提升表演互动感。

tr.description:
LUCH Films is a modern app for giving images the effect of film photography. Try unique bokeh effects, light leaks, noise and dust effects, and original filters.

20+ HANDMADE FILTERS

The application has over 20 different filters made by hand by a professional photographer. They are universal and made for various kinds of photos and colors, imitating the effects film KODAK and ILFORD.

FILM FRAMES FOR INSTAGRAM STORY AND FEED

We have adapted film frames for modern screen formats and added them to the application so that the warmth of film photography will always remain in our hearts and minds.

DUST EFFECT

Making a shabby photo is easy. You don't have to wait 20 years, you just have to choose one of 35 effects.

LIGHT LEAKS

You know these old light leaks shots that we loved to look at as children. We simulated the same light flashes in the LUCH FILMS.

BOKEH EFFECT

If you love bokeh as much as we do, then you should definitely love it. Choose from 35 bokeh and prism effects.

NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS, NO IN-APP PURCHASES

Take full control over your image, apply unique filters developed in collaboration with photographers. Create unique photos including new layers. Over 90 effects. The ability to apply noise and dust effects, light leaks, bokeh and prism effects to the image.

You can choose the size of the image for a stream or story, which is ideal for Instagram or other social networks. Film frames are also included in the LUCH Films.

Follow @luchfilmsapp on Instagram for inspiration from our community of users.
We love hearing your ideas and feedback. Please email hello@vostokapp.ru or DM us on Instagram at @luchfilmsapp for questions or suggestions.

tr.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
tr.releaseNotes: Fix for startup crash when Speak Screen accessibility option is enabled
tr.description:
You wake up, alone, on a strange island full of puzzles that will challenge and surprise you.

You don't remember who you are, and you don't remember how you got here, but there's one thing you can do: explore the island in hope of discovering clues, regaining your memory, and somehow finding your way home.

The Witness is a single-player game in an open world with dozens of locations to explore and over 500 puzzles. This game respects you as an intelligent player and it treats your time as precious. There's no filler; each of those puzzles brings its own new idea into the mix. So, this is a game full of ideas.

Keep the words, pictures, videos, voice and positions you want to record at any time and anywhere.
And there are reminders that you can never forget.
